remarks: Reversal of a finite sum.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Nov-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Apr-2016.)
statement:
fsumrev2.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ j e. ( M ... N ) ) -> A e. CC ) $.
fsumrev2.2 $e |- ( j = ( ( M + N ) - k ) -> A = B ) $.
fsumrev2 $p |- ( ph -> sum_ j e. ( M ... N ) A = sum_ k e. ( M ... N ) B ) $.
$d A k $.
$d B j $.
$d M j k $.
$d N j k $.
$d j k ph $.
